wikipedia_page.main: Jeremy Clarke (born 5 February 1962) is a British-born poet.

response: thumb|right|300px|The stone installation by Emily Young and Jeremy Clarke

A recent addition is a polished marble stone at the entrance to the church, a collaboration between and a gift from the poet Jeremy Clarke and the sculptor Emily Young. It is inscribed: "And I am here / in a place / beyond desire or fear", an extract from the long poem "Praise" by Clarke.
**Jeremy Clarke, British poet, in Hitchin, Hertfordshire
* Jeremy Clarke (governor) (1605–1652), colonial settler and President of the Colony of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations
